flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your PayPal account with the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open PayPal now

steps.content: Go to **www.paypal.com** and log into your account.
Click on the gear icon in the top right corner and go to the **Security** section.
Go to **2-step verification** and click **Set Up**.
Choose **Use an authentication  app** and click **Set It Up**.

Scan the displayed QR code to pair the service with the 2FAS app.

You can also do that by retyping the key under the QR code.
Go to **www.paypal.com** and log into your account.
Click on the menu icon in the top left corner, then tap on the gear icon in the upper right corner.
Go to the **Security** section and click **2-step verification**.
Choose **Use an authentication app** and click **Set It Up**.

Scan the displayed QR code to pair the service with the 2FAS app.

You can also do that by retyping the key under the QR code.
Open the PayPal app, then tap the your avatar in the top left corner.

Tap **Login and security**, then choose **Skip extra approvals for faster payments**.
Close the pop-up window.
Choose **Use an authentication  app** and tap **Set It Up**.

Scan the displayed QR code to pair the service with the 2FAS app.

You can also do that by retyping the key under the QR code.
